title: Kryza, R., Pin, C., Oberc-Dziedzic, T., Crowley, Q.G., and Larionov, A., 2014, Deciphering the geochronology of a large granitoid pluton (Karkonosze Granite, SW Poland): an assessment of U–Pb zircon SIMS and Rb–Sr whole-rock dates relative to U–Pb zircon CA-ID-TIMS: International Geology Review. DOI: 10.1080/00206814.2014.886364
